content.text: Hey! I'm doing well, I recently started a new job and I'm enjoying it so far. What about you?
Hey! I'm doing pretty well, I'm just preparing for my next acting gig. What kind of job do you have?
I'm a welder, I make metal structures for buildings. What kind of acting do you do?
I do stage acting, mostly in musicals. I'm really excited for my next role, I get to play a villain!
That sounds really cool! I love musicals, I used to do them in high school. What's your favorite musical?
My favorite is probably Les Misérables, it's such a powerful story. What's yours?
Mine is probably Phantom of the Opera, I love the music and the story.
That's a good one too, I love the music as well.
What's your favorite part about acting?
I love getting to step into someone else's shoes and tell a story. It's such a great feeling to be able to make people laugh and cry.
That's so true, it's a really rewarding experience. What's your dream role?
My dream role would be to play the Phantom in Phantom of the Opera. I've always wanted to play that role.
That would be amazing, I'm sure you'd be great in it.
